verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in His <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
His <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will be <S%H1368>mighty<s%> on <S%H776>earth;<s%> The <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> and <S%H6239>riches<s%> are in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> And his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
<S%H216>Light<s%> <S%H2224>arises<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright;<s%> [He is] <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>compassionate<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>well<s%> with the <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> and <S%H9233>lends;<s%> He will <S%H3557>maintain<s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
For he will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H4131>shaken;<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H2143>remembered<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He will not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8052>tidings;<s%> His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> <S%H982>trusting<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H5564>upheld,<s%> he will not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> he <S%H7200>looks<s%> [with satisfaction] on his <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>

He has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6340>freely<s%> to the <S%H34>poor;<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endures<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> His <S%H7161>horn<s%> will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in <S%H9202>honor.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> it and be <S%H3707>vexed;<s%> He will <S%H2786>gnash<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> and <S%H4549>melt<s%> <S%H4549>away;<s%> The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will perish.
